alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 5:44PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS ALONG A STRONG COLD FRONT WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GULF...WAKULLA...GADSDEN... JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR...EASTERN LIBERTY...LEON... FRANKLIN...MADISON...IRWIN...NORTHWESTERN LANIER...LEE...TIFT... WORTH...EASTERN DECATUR...GRADY...TURNER...BERRIEN...MITCHELL... LOWNDES...COLQUITT...BEN HILL...COOK...DOUGHERTY...NORTHEASTERN BAKER...THOMAS AND BROOKS COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EST/615 PM CST/... At 543 PM EST/443 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 7 miles west of Cordele to near Putney to 7 miles southwest of St George Island. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Monticello, Newton, Albany, Nashville, Adel, Quincy, Pelham, Perry, Fitzgerald, Cairo, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Thomasville, Valdosta, Ashburn, and Ocilla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
